reviewText:
The story had a good plot, but the dialogue was not always a clearly spoken as it should have been.  Also, this type of intrigue was rather dated.

F. S. Vandervoort

This is a classic from the 60s spy mania period.  It has some very famous acting people in it.  Unlike James Bond, the plot has some semblance of historic truth.

One problem with the VHS version is that the material has been edited to get from a R rating to a PG rating.
